mdRecord.dcterms:title: Le tiers liure des faicts et dicts heroïques du bon Pantagruel / Composé par M. Fran. Rabelais docteur en Medicine
Tiers livre des faicts et dicts heroiques du bon Pantagruel
Rabelais, François, approximately 1490-1553?. Gargantua et Pantagruel. 3e livre
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rabelais, François, approximately 1490-1553?
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reueu, & corrigé par l'Autheur, sus la censure antique.
Errors in foliation: nos. 90-99 omitted. Leaves in Signature G are incorrectly numbered 51, 50, 53, 52, 55, 54 57, 56 instead of 49-56.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect. Lacking leaf Y4, a blank. Binder: Thouvenin. Extensively annotated. Tipped in note gives provenance as follows: L'annotateur (encore inconnu) du XVIe siècle; Guy Patin; Morellet; Ch. Nodier; Aimé Martin; Taschereau (?); Roger Portalis; Marcel Schwab. Notes by Auger and Charles Nodier about the annotations and other provenance information, are tipped in. With bookplates of Martin and Portalis. Rawles & Screech give additional owners as Rahir, Pierre Louÿs and Jean Mayen, and state that the annotations are ascribed to Patin. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 764.
